title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.102 - Corned beef round and other corned beef cuts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.102 - Corned beef round and other corned beef cuts

State Regulations

In preparing "Corned Beef Round" and other corned beef
cuts, except "Corned Beef Briskets", the curing solution shall be applied to
pieces of beef weighing not less than one pound and such application shall not
result in an increased weight of the cured beef product of more than 10 percent
over the weight of the fresh uncured beef cut. If the product is cooked, the
weight of the finished product shall not exceed the weight of the fresh uncured
beef cut. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

319.102

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
